medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports that her pain began yesterday morning and has been intermittent, occurring every few hours. She describes it as sharp, achy pain. In addition, a more diffuse, dull achy pain has been ongoing for the past 2 days. Nothing aggravates or alleviates either the sharp pain in the RUQ or the more diffuse abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: macroglobulinemia on Vlcade and rituxan, autoimmune hemolytic anemia (mixed warm and cold), COPD on home O2 (refuses), asthma, DM, HTN, CAD, diverticulitis with colostomy s/p take down, choledocholithiasis s/p ERCP and sphincterotomy, PVD, cluster headaches, history of delirium when hospitalized.
medical_history.family_history: Father lived to old age, mother had Alzheimer's, brother has diabetes mellitus, sister has Alzheimer's.
